title: Persephone, from 'Persephone' series
description: two images of a reclining female nude; upper image white on black; PL leg bent under and PR leg knee up; head to right edge; lower image red nude with hair spilling over marked left edge of image frame; black piraminds upper right; shadow of bird in flight lower right
